songwriter.name: Elias McDaniel a.k.a. Bo Diddley

adapted by
McKinley Morganfield a.k.a. Muddy Waters

lyrics.l: Everythin', everythin', everytin's gonna be alright this mornin'
Now when I was a young boy, at the age of five
My mother said I was, gonna be the greatest man alive
But now I'm a man, way past 21
Want you to believe me baby,
I spell mmm, aaa child, nnn
I'm a natural born lovers man
Sittin' on the outside, just me and my mate
You know I'm made to move you honey,
I spell mmm, aaa child, nnn
I'm a natural born lovers man
The line I shoot will never miss
When I make love to a woman,
I'm gonna bring back my second cousin,
I can make love to you woman,
I spell mmm, aaa child, nnn
I'm a natural born lovers man
Don't hurt me, don't hurt me child
don't hurt me, don't hurt, don't hurt me child
lyrics.note:
Note 1: alternate previously used text for this line, Lord be oooh child, why . The line No B, O child, Y
was suggested to me by Mike O'Keefe on March 18, 1999 and I think Mike is right here, it perfectly fits the preceding lines of the lyrics so I substituted the old text with his suggestion. Thanks to Mike O'Keefe for this contribution!
